alert.note: Alert for Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 4:36PM CDT until September 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAKE COUNTY... At 436 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Forest Center, or 20 miles southeast of Ely, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Forest Center, southern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, Hudson Lake, Bald Eagle Lake, Thomas Lake, Alice Lake, Perent Lake, Kawishiwi Lake, Isabella Lake, Disappointment Lake, Silver Island Lake, Lake Three, Lake Two, Phoebe Lake, and Wilson Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
